thread.title: Over night Evens Evens from London
thread.title_full: Over night Evens Evens from London - Review of Ibis Styles Paris Pigalle Montmartre, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Michael H
title: Over night Evens Evens from London
text: Very nice rooms, very friendly staff and really nice breakfast. The coffee maker is one I would love to have in my office or home. The location was a shocker, but once we got past the ladies and gents of the night, we were fine. A bit noise (trains run underneath the building) at first but just turn on the tv, and it was fine. Oh, McDonald is also in walking distance.
